Html:
I am trying to implement windows 7 icon overlays on my Shell Window.

I am able to get things like the progress to work properly, but can't seem to get the overlay to work.  Even manually setting the Overlay doesn't work.

I am able to get this to work in other non-Prism projects.  Any advice will be welcomed.

Hi,

It could be helpful if you could provide us with a repro sample (for example SkyDrive) of your solution, so that we can help you find out the cause of the unexpected behavior you're experiencing.

Thanks,

Miguel Bronzovic
http://blogs.southworks.net/mbronzovic
